name: An Fóram Uisce - the Water Forum
memberOrga: An Fóram currently has 28 members, appointed by the Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government, pursuant to the Water Services Act 2017.
goal: An Fóram Uisce is a statutory body, established in accordance with the Water Services Act 2017.  It consists of stakeholders representing organisations with an interest in the quality of Ireland's water bodies and its role has been incorporated into Ireland's River Basin Management Plan (2nd cycle). An Fóram is to advise the relevant Government Minister with regard to water policy including the River Basin Management Plan and the WFD.  It also has a role with regard to Ireland's Water and Waste Water Services.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Education and training, Environment
euInitiatives: An Fóram has a statutory role to advise the Water Policy Advisory Committee (WPAC) in Ireland on matters pertaining to the objectives of the EU Water Framework Directive.
